settings.title: How much does shipping cost?
settings.content: Shipping costs will vary depending on the shipping destination and the number of items that you purchase. The correct amount of shipping fee will show up at the checkout page.

settings.title: How long will it take to ship my order?
settings.content: Orders typically arrive within 5-20 business days. Shipping times vary based on the product and destination.

settings.title: What are the sizing specs of my order?
settings.content: You can access our sizing guide, which includes all of the sizing information for products here

settings.title: I’m having issues placing an order.
settings.content: We’re sorry to hear that you’re unable to place an order. Please contact Customer Service and we will work on resolving the issue as quickly as possible

settings.title: I’d like to modify my order.
settings.content: Since our orders are custom produced, your order is only eligible to be modified within 02 hours of placing the order. Kindly send us an email at support@aksharveda.com with email title: "NEED TO CANCEL/ CHANGE MY ORDER - [YOUR ORDER NUMBER]"

settings.title: I’d like to cancel my order.
settings.content: Since our orders are custom produced, your order is only eligible to be modified within 02 hours of placing the order. Kindly send us an email at support@aksharveda.com with email title: "NEED TO CANCEL/ CHANGE MY ORDER - [YOUR ORDER NUMBER]"

settings.title: I'd like to return or replace my order
settings.content: We stand behind our quality and offer a 100% quality guarantee on any items purchased from our store. Please review our Returns Policy for details on how to set up a return.

settings.title: Report a campaign for policy violations.
settings.content: As a user-generated content platform, we take infringing content concerns seriously and appreciate you taking the time to report a suspected violation. In order to place a formal complaint, please follow the instructions on this page

settings.title: How do I contact customer support?
settings.content: We are happy to answer any questions you may have. Please contact Customer Service at or contact us via support@aksharveda.com

settings.title: About us
settings.content:
At AksharVeda, we bring you exquisitely crafted murtis that embody the rich heritage and spiritual essence of India. Each idol is a masterpiece, meticulously designed by skilled artisans who pour their heart and soul into every creation.

Your happiness is our top priority for each and every gift we deliver!
